summary: Starts the web audio context on iOS / Chrome

ports.name: Use Custom Selector
ports.text: Whether or not to to use custom selector(s), if not the canvas is used

ports.name: Selectors
ports.text: Selectors of the HTML DOM elements which start the audio context (separated by spaces, e.g. '#myButton .otherButtons'). Per default this is the whole patch â€“ `#glcanvas`

ports.name: Is Ready
ports.text: Once the audio context has been started (and it is therefore save to play sounds) this becomes `true`

changelog.message: fixed - removed a user op from tim which was causing the patch to not load for users
changelog.author: andro
